name: Pacheco's Adventure!
description:
Hello! Thanks for checking out our short demo of a game! Hope you enjoy the effort everyone has poured into it the past month!

Controls: 

A/D - move left/right

ESC - Pause

S - Drop through platforms - Crouch/Uncrouch

F/Left Click - Melee Combo (rapidly tap to reach up to three hits)

G/Right Click - Use active Tool

Q/E - Switch active tool

And thank you to everyone who  helped to create this!

Colyde - (Art)

Spoiled_King - (Art)

Zeniac - (UI)

TomSa - (MusicScore)

Rylark  - (Sound Design)

Me! Penguinhedgehog - (Programming)
